result.markdown: --- title: Conference include-in-header: - _includes/fontawesome.html --- ::: {.cell} ::: ![](images/conference-banner.png) rainbowR is having its first ever conference! ` visit the conference website`{=html} ` register for the conference`{=html} **Why are we having a conference?** To connect, support and promote LGBTQ+ folks who code in R, to raise awareness of LGBTQ+ issues through data-driven activism, to share our work with R, and to bolster the rainbowR community. **When will the conference be?** February 25-26th, 2026, 4pm-9pm UTC. **Who is the conference for?** For LGBTQ+ folks who code in R, and allies, from across the world. **Where will the conference be?** Online. **What will the conference consist of?** Regular and lightning talks, keynotes, workshops, and socials. **Who will have overall oversight of the conference?** Ella Kaye, supported by her Software Sustainability Institute fellowship. **Where can we find out more?** Visit the [conference website](https://conference.rainbowr.org/) for more details. If you'd like to discuss, get in touch with us: [hello@rainbowr.org](mailto:hello@rainbowr.org).
